dict.string: The Vatican has enough money to end poverty in the world twice
In effect, they have enough money to eradicate world poverty
The seahorse is so faithful to its partner that when one dies, the other does too soon after
They can't live without each other
Humans are the only living beings who have sex for pleasure
Dolphins and bonobos also have sex for pleasure
The apple seed contains cyanide and is toxic
If ingested in sufficient quantity it's can cause death.
You can shave a cat's whiskers without any problem
The sense of balance in cats depends largely on their whiskers
A koala needs to drink at least once a day
The koala can stop drinking for long periods (up to several months) the water it needs is obtained from its food
Edison feared the dark
Indeed, it is said that his most famous invention (the light bulb) is due to that fear
Scorpions are the only animals that commit suicide when they cannot escape a dangerous situation
Better dead than slave!!
A hamster's eyes can fall off if it is hung upside down
It's eye nerves and muscles are very weak
If you divide the number of female bees by the number of male bees in a honeycomb, you get the golden number
Approaches the number pi
Palm trees originated at the North Pole
In fact, they flourished in the Arctic 50 million years ago
Cervantes and Shakespeare died the same day
The spirit of letters leaves this world the same day
